bio: Chef Liu: Master of Szechuan cuisine, with a love for bold flavors and spicy dishes. Famous for his ma po tofu, he brings fiery heat to every dish he creates.he is our main chef
Chef Zhang: Cantonese cuisine specialist, known for his delicate touch and attention to detail. He creates beautifully plated dishes that are both delicious and visually stunning.
Chef Wang: Master of dim sum, his dumplings are perfectly steamed or fried with a variety of savory fillings. His dishes are sure to delight any fan of Chinese cuisine.
Chef Li: A wok master, his stir-fries are made with fresh ingredients and packed with flavor. He creates healthy, delicious dishes that are perfect for any meal. chef li is awsome
Chef Chen: A noodle expert, he creates hand-pulled noodles that are a must-try. He's also skilled in making savory soups that are perfect for a chilly day.chef chen is extraordinary
Chef Zhou: A specialist in northern Chinese cuisine, he uses traditional techniques and spices to create comforting, hearty dishes. His bold flavors are sure to please any food lover.
